nodes.bodyText: Can you set this as a param with default value "centraluseuap"
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +74,16 @@ jobs:
         value: ${{ parameters.Location }}
 
     strategy:
-      matrix: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+      matrix: 
+        ${{ insert }}: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+        ${{ if eq(parameters.TestCanary, 'true') }}:          
+          Linux - Java 8 (AzureCloudCanary):            
+            OSVmImage: 'ubuntu-18.04'            
+            JavaTestVersion: '1.8'            
+            DisplayName: 'Linux - Java 8'            
+            SubscriptionConfiguration: $(sub-config-azure-cloud-test-resources-preview)            
+            Location: centraluseuap

nodes.bodyText: I would probably add a Java 11 run instead of 8.
Thanks. Updated as suggested and triggered the pipeline again.. let me know if that's good.
As an aside for Canary should we be using the "-preview" or the "-dogfood" subscription
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +75,16 @@ jobs:
         value: ${{ parameters.Location }}
 
     strategy:
-      matrix: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+      matrix: 
+        ${{ insert }}: ${{ parameters.Matrix }}
+        ${{ if eq(parameters.TestCanary, 'true') }}:          
+          Linux - Java 11 (AzureCloudCanary):            
+            OSVmImage: 'ubuntu-18.04'
+            JavaTestVersion: '1.11'
+            DisplayName: 'Linux - Java 11'          
+            SubscriptionConfiguration: $(sub-config-azure-cloud-test-resources-preview)

nodes.bodyText: @danieljurek suggested '-preview' for special cases like this since we shouldn't disturb the main (normal) subscription with new/more permissions. We haven't talked about '-dogfood' subscription, I'll leave it to you to decide.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -73,7 +75,16 @@ jobs:

+            JavaTestVersion: '1.11'

+            SubscriptionConfiguration: $(sub-config-azure-cloud-test-resources-preview)
